translated: . The Section on the Minor Buddhas
In one hundred and eighteen aeons,
the Buddhas, the highest of two-footed beings,
had no equal in the world.
the unsurpassed one, the one with the straight shaft.
Tisso and Phussa, the Awakened Ones,
In the past, twenty-four eons ago,
And Metteyya will be in the future;
Wise and compassionate to the world.
